description: Adds or removes a gpg key from the rpm db

state.description: If the key will be imported or removed from the rpm db.

validate_certs.description: If C(no) and the C(key) is a url starting with https, SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only be used on personally controlled sites using self-signed certificates.

key.description: Key that will be modified. Can be a url, a file, or a keyid if the key already exists in the database.
